This face will contain one loop (loop\\_1), which consists of eight connected lines (line\\_1 through line\\_8): * line\\_1: Start Point: 0.0, 0.0, End Point: 0.375, 0.0 * line\\_2: Start Point: 0.375, 0.0, End Point: 0.375, 0.25 * line\\_3: Start Point: 0.375, 0.25, End Point: 0.25, 0.25 * line\\_4: Start Point: 0.25, 0.25, End Point: 0.25, 0.125 * line\\_5: Start Point: 0.25, 0.125, End Point: 0.125, 0.125 * line\\_6: Start Point: 0.125, 0.125, End Point: 0.125, 0.25 * line\\_7: Start Point: 0.125, 0.25, End Point: 0.0, 0.25 * line\\_8: Start Point: 0.0, 0.25, End Point: 0.0, 0.0 Note that loop\\_1 is a closed loop consisting of lines only.
